channel.title: Test Of Lies: Forum ToL Test Game 1[Blue Dragon, Alchemist and King win!]
channel.description:
##Welcome
**Rules** 1. Don't be a dick 2. Don't be inactive 3. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 4. Don't throw the game 5. Don't break rules 1-4
**Gameplay** Days will be 5 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Black Rose/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in my [Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
**Executions** To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by messaging me After the votes are revealed, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day Trials pause the counter
**After The Night** You will be told what happened to you >Night: You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed Day: You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened
**Journals** Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
**To Join** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
**Rolelist:** **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Sheriff/Paladin[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]**
Players: 1. FadeBlade - Dead 2. Queen Alfa - Dead 3. Xerxes - Dead 4. yauaustin202 - Dead 5. orangeandblack5 - Alive 6. moonbird - Alive 7. PolikShadowbliss - Alive 8. Schultz - Dead 9. Dooku - Dead 10. Hippolytus - Alive 11. suddenlyANerd - King - Alive 12. Jordarrian - Alive 13. deadfrien - Alive 14. Anthony_Python - Alive 15. Damafaud - Alive
Graveyard: 1. FadeBlade - Executed for Treason Day 3 - [color=steblue]**Sheriff**[/color] 8. Schultz - Poisoned by an [color=green]**Alchemist**[/color] Night 3 - [color=steblue]**Princess**[/color] 2. Queen_Alfa - Executed for Treason Day 4 - **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]** 9. Dooku - Executed by the [color=steblue]**Prince**[/color] Night 4 - [color=steblue]**Priest**[/color] 3. Xerxes - Slain by a [color=steblue]**Knight**[/color] Night 5 - **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]** 4. yauaustin202 - Executed for Treason Day 6 - **Reaper**
Timeline: [Day 1](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-2-jord-is-a-nerd/253/28?u=jammysplodge) [Night 1](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-2-jord-is-a-nerd/253/81?u=jammysplodge) [Day 2](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-2-jord-is-a-nerd/253/95) [Vote Count 1](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-2-jord-is-a-nerd/253/307?u=jammysplodge) [Vote Count 2](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-2-jord-is-a-nerd/253/375?u=jammysplodge) [Day 3](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-3/253/420?u=jammysplodge) [FadeBlade is executed](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-3/253/609?u=jammysplodge) [Day 4](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-3/253/613?u=jammysplodge) [Queen_Alfa is executed](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-5/253/752?u=jammysplodge) [Day 5](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/test-of-lies-forum-tol-test-game-1-day-5/253/757?u=jammysplodge)

item.title: Test Of Lies: Forum ToL Test Game 1[Blue Dragon, Alchemist and King win!]
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Cheeky throwback to first ever FoL game which happened this time last year, when unseen were still called black rose, a ton of people were thought to be afk due to reaper, and half of the players have disappeared for ever. I was just a babby hippo. Also the first person we executed was the sheriff #proplays.

Nice to see how far FoL and it’s playerbase has evolved, mainly thanks to the fantastic FoL team.

Read full topic

item.source: Test Of Lies: Forum ToL Test Game 1[Blue Dragon, Alchemist and King win!]

item.title: Test Of Lies: Forum ToL Test Game 1[Blue Dragon, Alchemist and King win!]
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

The way I see it, three possibilities exist.

Priest!Dooku, Fool!Dooku, and Soulcatcher!Dooku.

Priest Dooku is either VI or playing at being a Fool.
Fool Dooku is a Fool.
Soulcatcher Dooku, in roleplaying his actual part, is trying to convince us he’s a Fool.

Either way, he should be executed ASAP, but at night. If you’re reading this, I will obviously be dead, but I would hope that Dooku will have already been killed by Dama.

Either way, moonbird, Xerxes, yau, Jord (likely dead), and Anthony are the only slots I cannot pin down, comprising of the Reaper, Assassin, Physician, Random Neutral if not Fool!Dooku (BD otherwise), and the final BD member (if Soulcatcher!Dooku) or BR member (if Priest!Dooku or Fool!Dooku). Hippo and Dead could both be BR if not Soulcatcher!Dooku, but I’d be more likely to peg one of our non-claimers for the title.

Since Jord is likely dead, and I can’t get a read on cbman’s slot (moon pulled a bit of a 180 tbh), I’d say the most likely scum candidate is Anthony, who should likely be our next lynch. Xerxes and yau would both also make good lynches, but bad information lynches due to relative lack of contribution to discussion.

So basically Anthony is pretty freaking evil, plz execute.

Dama is confirmed BD, trust him. Deadfrien is also good as long as he wasn’t converted, but I will not give out his role just yet. Let’s just say my silent whispers were quite effective, as were my bird metaphors.

Hippo is pretty safe due to actually claiming, and if I die I suppose y’all can know that Polik is totally the Alchemist. I told him to heal Dama, but if he doesn’t make sure he dies.

If it doesn’t say how I died, remember that that means that the Physician was killed by a Reaper or converted last night.

As for the king, I was about to poison him, due to there being a 67% chance of him not being BD, but since he was quite helpful in lynching Alfa I’m sparing him for now. Although he could still be any alignment (99% sure BR King doesn’t know other BR members), it’s worth keeping him around to guard Dama or some such.

I RB’d Anthony tonight, so if only I die and am reaped he’s both not the Reaper and likely the Assassin.

Best of luck.

Might’ve thought Jord was dead and Anthony would be a good lynch, but whatever.

Read full topic
item.source: Test Of Lies: Forum ToL Test Game 1[Blue Dragon, Alchemist and King win!]

item.title: Test Of Lies: Forum ToL Test Game 1[Blue Dragon, Alchemist and King win!]
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
That was actually awful to watch

I knew I was gonna get Reaped, but I had almost figured out the entire game. The only thing I didn’t know was who of Xerxes, yau, and Anthony were each remaining role.

Good game for the most part. Am going to point out that Dooku was basically gamethrowing, and I would not be against banning him from here on out.

Anyways, here’s my full will, just because:
